title: Ticket #4772: Document that concurrency limits don't work for scheduler universe
description: The concurrency limits (3.12.15 Concurrency Limits) don't work for scheduler universe (and probably not for local universe, either). That should be documented...
remarks:
2015-Jan-22 11:53:44 by smoler:
Concurrency limits are not applied in scheduler, local, and grid universes.

While updating for this ticket, heavily edited the entire section on concurrency limits.
check_ins: 2015-Jan-22 11:48   Check-in [42310]: Document #4772, and at the same time heavily edit the section describing concurrency limits. (By Karen Miller )
creator: wenger
